snippet.title: School of Magic - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Add School of Magic to your Wishlist today
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1106680/School_of_Magic?utm_source=youtubeAnnouncementTrailer&utm_campaign=AnnouncementTrailer&utm_medium=web


This game uses a lot of premade assets, I wrote a blog post about why I decided to go this direction.
https://parttimeindie.com/2020/03/10/more-asset-flips/


School of Magic is a Hack and Slay Roguelike game with a deckbuilding leveling system. Combine spells, face reckless creatures and make wise choices on the way to passing the entrance exam of the School of Magic.
